Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.model.interfaces

Interface ContentMetadataInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ContentMetadataFilter, SimpleContentMetadata
public interface ContentMetadataInterface

This interface describes container on the model tree. It supports a set of operations with model:

  • getRoot() - get root of the model tree.
  • walkDown(ContentWalker, URI) - walk (in depth) thru model tree
  • byUIPath(URI) - find unique node in the model tree by it's full IU path
  • byApplicationPath(URI) - find all nodes in the model tree with application paths associated
  • mount(URI, ContentMetadataInterface) - mount another container under any node (except root) in the tree model.
  • unmount(URI) - unmount all nodes mound earlier.

Mount operation allows you build total model from pieces of many other models

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.4

  • Method Details

    • getRoot

      ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata getRoot()

      Get root of the model tree

      Returns:
      root of the model tree

    • byApplicationPath

      ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata[] byApplicationPath​(java.net.URI applicationPath)

      Find all nodes with application path associated. Application path scheme can be #APPLICATION_SCHEME only

      Parameters:
      applicationPath - application path to find
      Returns:
      set of nodes found. Can be empty but not null

    • byUIPath

      ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata byUIPath​(java.net.URI uiPath)

      Find node by it's unique UI path

      Parameters:
      uiPath - UI path of the node. UI path scheme can be #UI_SCHEME only
      Returns:
      node found or null
      See Also:
      ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata.getUIPath()

    • walkDown

      void walkDown​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentWalker walker, java.net.URI uiPath)

      Walk thru the model tree (in depth) and execute callback on every node

      Parameters:
      walker - callback to execute on every node
      uiPath - UI path to start walking for. To walk all the tree use getRoot().getUIPath() value

    • mount

      void mount​(java.net.URI uiPath, ContentMetadataInterface model)

      Mount another container under the given node

      Parameters:
      uiPath - node unique path
      model - model to mount

    • unmount

      ContentMetadataInterface[] unmount​(java.net.URI uiPath)

      Unmount all the models from the given node

      Parameters:
      uiPath - node unique path
      Returns:
      all nodes unmound. Can be empty but not null
